products.name: Polyjuice Potion
products.description: Tired of seeing the same old face in the mirror everyday ? Good news, for an hour you won't have to !

products.name: Confusing Concoction
products.description: Causes the drinker to become confused, distracted and sick.

products.name: Accio
products.description: Single use. Convenient if you're on the couch and can't be bothered to stand to grab the remote

products.name: Alohomora
products.description: Single use. Unlocks safes, house doors, car doors. To use responsibly.

products.name: Oculus Reparo
products.description: Single use. This spell fixes glasses. Simple and to the point.

products.name: Scourgify
products.description: Hate spring cleaning? Then you’ll love this charm that does the cleaning for you.

products.name: Hiccoughing Potion
products.description: Hiccoughing is annoying. Get rid of it in two sips !

products.name: Pepperup Potion
products.description: Improves health, relieves coughs and colds. Side effect: causes steam to dribble from the patient's ears for several hours afterward.

products.name: Felix Felicis
products.description: Out of luck ? Not anymore ! Highly recommended before playing the lottery, asking for a promotion, or crossing the road with your eyes closed.

products.name: Muffliato
products.description: Single use. This spell is especially useful for parents hoping to discuss delicate topics around their kids. Muffliato fills targets’ ears with a buzzing noise, making them unable to hear anything around them.

products.name: Veritaserum
products.description: Want to know how people feel about you, for real ? With Veritaserum, you can finally find out. Usually paired with a 'Fixing hurt feelings' concotion.

products.name: Skele-Gro
products.description: To be administered by a medical professional, for bones re-growth. Side effects include extreme pain.

products.name: Sleekeazy's Hair Potion
products.description: Who needs hairgel when you have Sleekeazy's Hair Potion ?

products.name: Cushioning Charm
products.description: Single use. Never worry about falling again thanks to this charm that creates an invisible cushion around you or whatever you decide to use it on.

products.name: Draught of Peace
products.description: Provides personal comfort, calms anxiety and soothes agitation.

products.name: Beatles pin-badges
products.description: If one thing in life is true, it’s that you can never have enough pin-badges. Do you have a lot of them already? Doesn’t matter, buy more! Buy these beautiful Beatles badges NOW!

products.name: Beatles baseball jacket
products.description: Were the Beatles big baseball fans? Who cares! Wear this stylish jacket the next time you hit a home-run or whatever!

products.name: Yellow Submarine bottle-opener
products.description: Life gets boring even aboard the Yellow Submarine, so you’re definitely gonna need some beers, and what better way to open them than with this delightful Yellow Submarine bottle-opener!!!

products.name: Beatles drum lunch-box
products.description: Everybody eats lunch! But maybe you work somewhere without a cafeteria… what’re you gonna do?? Worry no more with this amazing drum-shaped Beatles lunchbox!!!

products.name: Beatles plush toys
products.description: Aren’t they just adorable? No more lonely nights with these soft ’n’ cuddly Fab Four plushies!!!

products.name: Record box
products.description: Hipsters! Why carry your music around inside your phone like a normal person, when you can lug a few vinyl record about in this big box! It’s got an apple on the side, but not that kind!

products.name: Portable record-player
products.description: So you’ve decided to replace your digital record collection with a massive stack of black plasic discs? You’re gonna need something to play them on. Retro style and retro quality can be yours with this amazing Dansette-style portable turntable.

products.name: Ringo Starr muh
products.description: Express your hatred for everybody’s least favourite Brexit-supporting Beatle with this Ringo-themed mug! Smash it on the floor! Dissolve it in acid! Lauch it into outer-space. The options are endless!

products.name: Magical Mystery Tour t-shirt
products.description: What a beautifully-designed t-shirt! Pretend you saw them in their hippie-phase even though your were born at least a decade after they split up with this pretend-tour-tshirt. One size fits some!

products.name: Yellow Submarine toy
products.description: What the hell were they playing at with all this Yellow Submarine nonsense. I blame Ringo. But if, for some reason, you like that sort of thing, why not buy this probably-safe little toy thing!
